title: ISic003438. I.Sicily inscription 003438
body:
Facsimile Images

ἐπί ἱεροπόλου
[---]ΤΟΣ
Ἀπολλωνίου
[---]ΝBB
5Θεόδωρος
[Ἀ]πολλόδρου
[---]ΝΝB
Κράτυλος
Εὐκ++[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Merlini 1841; Merlini reports a small circle upper right of the N, and traces of what might be a capital T after the second b
7: Merlini reports a small circle upper right of the first N
8: Merlini 1841: ΚΡΑΤΓΣΤΟΣ; Messina 1992: Κράτυλος

translation

commentary

Orsi's transcription and editing of the original report of Merlini is not entirely faithful, and Messina's reading of lines 8-9 as another name seems preferable. The symbols left uninterpreted by Orsi must be numerals and find approximate parallels (even if not certain interpretation) among other later Hellenistic Sicilian texts (see e.g. the gallery texts from the Euryalos fortifications).

bibliography

  • Tamburino Merlini 1841 195 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002231
  • Orsi 1900 57 no.35 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001707
  • Messina 1992 146 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001750
